verbs.description: si jobs leadership stable after sale rotterdam no changes in the workforce [V: are] anticipated at the newly - sold si group which will continue to be led primarily by its existing executive team of the dozen people identified as holding leadership roles in the revamped company which was sold this summer to a private investment firm eight come from si group according to a company press release on monday the firm employs about 200 workers at its balltown road headquarters and about 200 workers at its chemical plant on route 5s in rotterdam with no changes planned in staffing levels said company spokeswoman tara morgan owned by the wright family for more than a century si group was sold this summer to sk capital partners leadership remaining in place under the new owners includes si ceo frank bozich who has held the post since 2013 and will continue as ceo as well as previous si executives chris cornille brooke manrique tom masterson paul tilley katie ellet robert kaiser and chris roberts wright family foundation howard wright w howard wright schenectady varnish company silicon image si si company si group

si jobs leadership stable after sale rotterdam [ARG1: no changes in the workforce] are [V: anticipated] [ARGM-LOC: at the newly - sold si group which will continue to be led primarily by its existing executive team of the dozen people identified as holding leadership roles in the revamped company which was sold this summer to a private investment firm eight come from si group] according to a company press release on monday the firm employs about 200 workers at its balltown road headquarters and about 200 workers at its chemical plant on route 5s in rotterdam with no changes planned in staffing levels said company spokeswoman tara morgan owned by the wright family for more than a century si group was sold this summer to sk capital partners leadership remaining in place under the new owners includes si ceo frank bozich who has held the post since 2013 and will continue as ceo as well as previous si executives chris cornille brooke manrique tom masterson paul tilley katie ellet robert kaiser and chris roberts wright family foundation howard wright w howard wright schenectady varnish company silicon image si si company si group
